arts.ttl: Cifuentes ‘very happy’ after Dunne’s emphatic QPR return
arts.sum: Marti Cifuentes said he was “very happy” to see Jimmy Dunne back in the QPR side and playing a key role in the 2-1 victory at home to Blackburn. The win left Rangers just three points behind the play-off places.
